page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: There is no{recreation ground}in Selattyn area. There are no playing fields,{cricket} or{football}clubs. There are no leisure centres in the Selattyn area. Most of the the children in the class who live in the area play in woods & fields because there is no playing fields in Selattyn. If you want to go{swimming}or to the{cinema} you have to go into Oswestry. Some people go{fishing}but they have to go out of the area because there are no lakes only a small stream. {Gardening}is one of the few recreations which can be practice in the area.
